name: Bandito
description:
Bandito is a dungeon crawler where you must beat various rooms on an alien planet while collecting cool loot along the way!

Controls:

  • WASD - move around
  • Mouse - look around
  • Left Click - attack
  • Shift - dash
  • E - Pickup item

There are quite a few bugs right now! Perhaps these will be ironed out in a post-jam version ;)
